item.title: This Giant Subterranean Neutrino Detector Is Taking On the Mysteries of Physics
item.description: Located in China, Juno is a 17-country collaboration that will try to detect neutrinos and antineutrinos to learn more about their mass.

item.title: Mushroom Supplements Are the Biohackers’ Latest Fix (2025)
item.description: Curious about mushroom supplements? Here’s what they do, what the science says, and how to know if they’re right for you—according to the experts.

item.title: India’s Urban Company soars 58% above IPO price in year’s most subscribed offering
item.description: Urban Company’s IPO, which opened last week, was oversubscribed more than 100 times, reflecting strong investor demand.
